amendment.description: Page 605, strike lines 16 through 21 and insert the following: SEC. 11203. OFFICE OF TRIBAL RELATIONS. Section 309 of the Federal Crop Insurance Reform and Department of Agriculture Reorganization Act of 1994 (7 U.S.C. 6921) is amended to read as follows: ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 27 printed in House Report 115-679 to create a new initiative to allow the United States Department of Agriculture to match funds invested in educational programs or services for Indians.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Noem amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A044) offered by Mrs. Noem.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Noem amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
